# Kool Studio — Interior Architecture & Design

> Kool Studio is a Wrocław-based interior architecture practice founded by Jacek Leszczyński. We design distinctive residential and commercial interiors across Poland, combining design sensitivity with precision and experience.

## Services
- Interior architecture (concept, executive design, author supervision)
- Custom furniture design
- Custom lighting design
- Visual identity for commercial spaces
- Uniform design for hospitality and retail

## Location
- Office: Zaporoska 83/15, Wrocław, Poland
- Service area: Wrocław, Warsaw, and all of Poland

## Contact
- Email: hello@koolstudio.pl
- Website: https://koolstudio.pl

## Selected Projects

### Delikatesy Dehesa — Wrocław
Iberian delicatessen interior design (58 m², 2023). A full-scope project including interior concept, custom furniture, custom lamps, executive documentation, visual identity, and staff uniforms. The space blends Almodóvar-inspired colors with handcrafted terrazzo floors and custom red-arch lamps.

### Dom Dobrzykowice
Residential house interior in Dobrzykowice near Wrocław (180 m², 2024). Warm natural materials paired with precise detailing and functional spatial layout.

### Winobar — Łódź
Intimate wine bar interior in central Łódź (95 m², 2025). Distinctive identity with a curated atmosphere.

### Hotel Belmonte — Ustronie Morskie
Seaside hotel interior design (1200 m², 2026, in progress). Combining coastal atmosphere with contemporary design across guest rooms and public areas.

### Pawilon Fandom — Wrocław
Commercial pavilion with raw concrete aesthetics in central Wrocław (250 m², 2026, in progress).

### Kancelaria — Wrocław
Office interior with calm, warm aesthetics (80 m², 2025). Light interiors with wood and terrazzo accents.

## Keywords
